name: Jitsu
description: The easiest real-time data collection in the world. Please, read the guide before deploying: https://jitsu.com/docs/deployment/deploy-on-heroku

CONFIGURATOR_ADMIN_TOKEN.description: A secret Jitsu Configurator Admin token for Jitsu Server -> Jitsu Configurator integration

SERVER_ADMIN_TOKEN.description: A secret Jitsu Server Admin token for Jitsu Configurator -> Jitsu Server integration

UI_AUTH_ACCESS_SECRET.description: An access secret for UI authorization flow. Please keep this secret for restarting Jitsu with the same UI login/password

UI_AUTH_REFRESH_SECRET.description: An refresh secret for UI authorization flow. Please keep this secret for restarting Jitsu with the same UI login/password

GEO_MAXMIND_PATH.description: GEO data resolution (https://jitsu.com/docs/other-features/geo-data-resolution). HTTP URL to hosted maxmind DB file.
